editor.style: border: none; color: #333333; background-color: #ffffff; selection-background-color: #b3d4ff; font-size: {font_size}px; line-height: 1.5;

scrollbar.style: QScrollBar:vertical { background: transparent; width: 6px; margin: 0px; border-radius: 3px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); min-height: 30px; border-radius: 3px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical:hover { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); } QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical { height: 0px; } QScrollBar::add-page:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-page:vertical { background: none; }

status_bar.icon: color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.7); hover { color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.9); background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); border-radius: 8px; }
status_bar.active_icon: color: #007acc; hover { color: #007acc; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); border-radius: 8px; }

preview.html_style: <style>body {font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; color: #333333; background-color: #ffffff; margin: 0; padding: 0 10px;} h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {color: #111111; margin-top: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px; font-weight: 600;} h1 {font-size: 2em; border-bottom: 1px solid #c8d0d8; padding-bottom: 0.3em;} h2 {font-size: 1.5em; border-bottom: 1px solid #c8d0d8; padding-bottom: 0.3em;} a {color: #007acc; text-decoration: none;} a:hover {text-decoration: underline;} code {font-family: 'SFMono-Regular', Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', Menlo, monospace; padding: 0.2em 0.4em; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); border-radius: 3px;} pre {background-color: #f0f4f8; border-radius: 6px; padding: 16px; overflow: auto;} pre code {background-color: transparent; padding: 0;} blockquote {color: #555555; border-left: 3px solid #c8d0d8; padding-left: 16px; margin-left: 0;} table {border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; margin: 16px 0;} table th, table td {border: 1px solid #c8d0d8; padding: 6px 13px;} table th {background-color: #f0f4f8;} hr {border: 1px solid #c8d0d8;}</style>
